scripts.dev: npm run dev:api & npm run dev:web
scripts.build: npm run build --workspace=apps/web && npm run build --workspace=apps/api
scripts.test: npm run test --workspace=apps/web && npm run test --workspace=apps/api
scripts.lint: npm run lint --workspace=apps/web && npm run lint --workspace=apps/api
scripts.typecheck: npm run typecheck --workspace=apps/web && npm run typecheck --workspace=apps/api
